articles.title: High BP in winter: Potassium-rich foods to eat in the cold - News9 LIVE
articles.description: Potassium is a nutrient which widens blood vessels to smoothen blood circulation naturally. Here's what you need to eat to treat high BP.
articles.content: If you thought that yogurt only has probiotics to offer, think again. As per experts, one cup of it can give 8.5 per cent of daily recommended value of potassium.
